title: Ep 126 | Criminal 'Duck Dynasty' Impersonators, Phil's Advice on Sex & How to Handle Temptation
description:
People passing themselves off as Jase, Willie, Si, and Phil have been getting up to no good. Al shares the story of a six-figure IRS check that was too good to be true. Phil has a memorable one-liner about avoiding sexual temptation and explains why God is the ultimate "information box." And the guys offer advice on how to deal with temptation, including Jase's "Devil's Horse" strategy.

﻿Get Jesus Politics by Phil Robertson, available now: https://www.amazon.com/Jesus-Politics-Back-Soul-America/dp/1400210062/
